ThingDef.label: egg box
ThingDef.description: A box with soft material made to hold eggs. Egg-laying animals will lay eggs in egg boxes if they can. Your haulers will take all the eggs out only when the box is full, to save time. The box also protects eggs from deteriorating outdoors, though it does not protect from temperature damage.

ThingDef.label: pen marker
ThingDef.description: A post with a sign designating an animal pen. It must be placed in an area enclosed by fences, barricades, walls, and doors. You can assign each pen marker a set of animals to accept, and handlers will bring animals to an appropriate pen.

ThingDef.label: large stele
ThingDef.description: A tall, thick slab with engravings on the sides. Steles have been used since ancient times to memorialize individuals, battles, and other important events.

ThingDef.label: grand stele
ThingDef.description: A towering slab with extensive engravings on the sides. Steles have been used since ancient times to memorialize individuals, battles, and other important events.

ThingDef.label: lectern
ThingDef.description: A slanted platform that holds a text in front of a speaker. Place it near the focus of rituals and speeches to extend the duration of their positive effects.

ThingDef.label: reliquary
ThingDef.description: A ceremonial building that protects and displays a relic. Relics are ancient objects venerated by believers of a specific ideoligion.

ThingDef.label: styling station
ThingDef.description: A table with a mirror and styling tools. People can use this to change their look.

ThingDef.label: gibbet cage
ThingDef.description: A steel cage for holding and displaying corpses. This horrifying sight inspires terror and disgust in observers. It is an especially brutal and effective way to terrorize slaves.

ThingDef.label: lightball
ThingDef.description: A decorative light that rotates and changes colors. Used as a focus for dance parties.

ThingDef.label: loudspeaker
ThingDef.description: A large loudspeaker for playing music. At least one is necessary to hold a dance party, and more loudspeakers will enhance the effect.

ThingDef.label: drum
ThingDef.description: A large wooden drum used as a music source for tribal rituals and parties.

ThingDef.label: pew
ThingDef.description: A long bench where ritual participants can sit while listening to a speaker. Place it facing rituals and speeches to extend the duration of their positive effects.

ThingDef.label: kneel sheet
ThingDef.description: A sheet on which believers kneel while observing rituals, praying, or discussing.

ThingDef.label: kneel pillow
ThingDef.description: A pillow on which believers kneel while observing rituals, praying, or discussing.

ThingDef.label: slab bed
ThingDef.description: A slab of hard material made to sleep on. Slab beds are uncomfortable, but some see their use as a demonstration of moral good.

ThingDef.label: slab double bed
ThingDef.description: A slab of hard material made to sleep on. Slab beds are uncomfortable, but some see their use as a demonstration of moral good. This one is wide enough to fit two people.

ThingDef.label: skullspike
ThingDef.description: A spike mounted upright for the purpose of piercing and displaying a human skull. To some, displayed skulls are a symbol of power. To others, they represent barbaric evil. Skullspikes are an especially brutal and effective way to terrorize slaves.

ThingDef.label: autobong
ThingDef.description: An automatic smokeleaf-burning device which generates a smoke cloud around itself. Anyone in the cloud will become high on smokeleaf over time.

ThingDef.label: small altar
ThingDef.description: A small platform that plays a role in ideoligious rituals.

ThingDef.label: medium altar
ThingDef.description: A medium platform that plays a role in ideoligious rituals.

ThingDef.label: large altar
ThingDef.description: A large platform that plays a role in ideoligious rituals.

ThingDef.label: grand altar
ThingDef.description: A grand platform that plays a role in ideoligious rituals.

ThingDef.label: ideogram
ThingDef.description: A large image drawn on the ground and reinforced with metal edges. It is used as a focus for rituals.

ThingDef.label: christmas tree
ThingDef.description: A celebratory tree decorated with ornaments and lights traditionally made as part of Christmas celebrations.

ThingDef.label: cannibal platter
ThingDef.description: An area of floor covered with pre-chopped and arranged human meat ready for a cannibal feast.

ThingDef.label: effigy
ThingDef.description: A rough wooden frame in the shape of a human, ready to be burned as part of a ritual.

ThingDef.label: sacrificial flag
ThingDef.description: A flag representing enemies, ready to be burned as part of a ritual.

ThingDef.label: pyre
ThingDef.description: A wooden tower for ritual burning.

ThingDef.label: burnbong
ThingDef.description: A wood structure packed with smokeleaf. It can be ignited during a ritual and produce a huge amount of smokeleaf smoke for a few hours, after which it is destroyed.

ThingDef.label: incense shrine
ThingDef.description: A collection of packed incense containers. It can be ignited and produce a powerful incense effect as a focus for rituals. It is destroyed after it burns down.

ThingDef.label: ritual spot
ThingDef.description: A spot for carrying out certain kinds of rituals.

ThingDef.label: small nature shrine
ThingDef.description: A small shrine for honoring spiritual beings. Tribal psycasters can focus on this shrine while meditating to increase psyfocus gain. Nature shrines lose their power if they are close to artificial structures, so they are always built in nature. Since they look like natural objects to unobservant outsiders, raiders will generally ignore them.

ThingDef.label: large nature shrine
ThingDef.description: A large shrine for honoring spiritual beings. Tribal psycasters can focus on this shrine while meditating to increase psyfocus gain. Nature shrines lose their power if they are close to artificial structures, so they are always built in nature. Since they look like natural objects to unobservant outsiders, raiders will generally ignore them.

ThingDef.label: tool cabinet
ThingDef.description: Increases work speed when placed near a workbench. One workbench can use up to two tool cabinets.
